key.name: use-transparency
key.summary: Sets if the panel uses transparency.
key.description: Disable this to provide higher contrasts and make indicators better readable.

key.name: autohide
key.summary: Sets if and how the panel will autohide.
key.description: Enable this to increase available desktop area and reduce clutter.

key.name: delay
key.summary: Sets how long before the panel will autohide in milliseconds.
key.description: Increase or decrease this value to your preference.
